custom-meta.meta-value: Data are owned by the Pennsylvania Department of Health, and the Geisinger Medical Health Center. The prospective data user requesting access would be required to enter into and abide by a data use agreement. Once granted, the data user would be able to access these data in the same manner as the authors. The authors are bound by a DUA, but otherwise do not have any other special access privileges that others would not have. For more information, please contact: Dr. Sameh Boktor, Pennsylvania Department of Health, (717)787-3350, and Dr. Joseph Boscarino, Geisinger Medical Health Center, (570) 214 â€“ 9622.
